pullRequest.title: Avoid part ID references in Refits and elsewhere
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is nasty and is not going to be fun to review...but at this point I am happy with just about all of the part ID issues I have been made aware of in the past. Basically: we're not going to reference parts by ID anywhere other than the CPNX file. Everywhere else should be using an actual reference to a Part object. That's about as close to avoiding part ID issues as you can get.
This is a draft because I'm not 100% on the refit code, but close.

commit.message: Don't reference replacement parts by ID
Don't merge parts which can't be merged
Have Refit use part references rather than IDs
Fix ammo and armor errors with cancelled refits

Make campaign respect non-spare parts

- Stage for AmmoBin not doing some campaign level work
Don't use ammo reserved for refits
Track ammo as a part on a refit
Get closer to fixing ammo purchases for custom refits
